text: John Cornelius Houbolt (April 10, 1919 - April 15, 2014) was an American aerospace engineer for NASA. He is best known for his work on the lunar mission mode called "lunar orbit rendezvous" (LOR). This was chosen for Apollo program in early 1962. He was born in Altoona, Iowa. Houbolt died from natural causes on April 15, 2014 in Scarborough, Maine, aged 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * John Houbolt at Encyclopedia Astronautica Category:1919 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Engineers from Maine Category:NASA Category:Scientists from Iowa Category:Scientists from Maine
title: John Houbolt
